team.bio: Satya loves to make themes, play with HTML, CSS and bash. He is a member of The Shimmer Project. He also works on some projects of his own, such as Fedora Utils, Elegance Colors etc. You can find his posts on worldofgnome.org.

team.role: Maintains the Numix-uTouch icons, designs most of the wallpapers.
team.bio: Georgi is the guy behind the design of Kazam, Unity Tweak Tool, Smuxi, XNoise, Athena and a bundle of more community and third party apps. He is also an Ubuntu member. He writes on omgubuntu.co.uk and his personal blog mechoslav.wordpress.com.

team.role: Responsible for most of our branding, maintains the base icons.
team.bio: Joern is a digital artist with knowledge in Javascript, PHP, etc. He is into everything surrounding Graphic Design, Illustrations, Comics, Web Design and everything Open Source. He has a website, upinthesky.net.

team.role: Maintains the PPA and USC packages.
team.bio: Paolo is passionate about IT, and technology in general. He is a supporter of Open Source Software and an Ubuntu member. He has contributed to many projects including Ubuntu. You can visit his blog at paolorotolo.blogspot.com.

team.role: Works on the Numix Desktop Experience; Generalist.
team.bio:
Sam is a generalist designer, most recognizably as an icon designer. He is an Ubuntu member and one of the team behind Unity Tweak Tool, and also a contributor to GNOME & Ubuntu.

He maintains several of his own projects; the open source Moka Icon & GTK themes. He also has a website.
